name: Give 'Em Hell
description:
Description:
Created as a college group project, Give 'Em Hell is a local multiplayer free for all where you can compete with your friends in an infernal storm of magical bullets. See the trailer for a technical showcase and demonstration.

Power-Ups - Deals
All deals stack up to six times. At six stacks, a deal's boon becomes stronger, and its bane is deactivated.

 - Speed
Increases movement speed, increases knockback taken.
 - Power
Increases damage* dealt, reduces projectile speed.
 - Spread
Increases number of projectiles, reduces projectile size.
 - Velocity
Increases projectile speed, reduces knockback* dealt.
 - Attack Speed
Increases attack speed, reduces accuracy.
 - Resistance
Reduces knockback taken, increases hit box size.

*damage is a cumulative knockback modifier.

Power-Ups - Bargains
Bargains are temporary abilities of great power... and often great risk.
 - Machine Gun
Fire uncontrollably for a few seconds, showering the field in bullets.
 - Shield
Surround yourself with a protective barrier that must be destroyed before anything can pass through.
 - Dash
Gain the ability to dash for a time, at the cost of fine tuned movement.
 - Mines
Spawn a multitude of slow moving bombs, dealing massive damage to foes who touch them.
 - Sniper
Fire a devestating shot that deal heavy damage and pierce through shields, but leaves you stunned with its recoil.

Credits
Programmers:
Herman Larsson, Mattias Nordin, Elliot Lundin, Axel Lundberg, Oscar Milstein

3D-Modelling:
Sophia Lundström, nikasomkhishvil (Fiverr user)

Game Art:
Sophia Lundström, dghzdesign (Fiverr user), ahmedhilmi (Fiverr user)

Music:
Elliot Dahlgren
